inclusion.criterion: 472 children presenting persistent moderate or severe asthma.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Study will be performed only in Brazil, solely by our Clinical Research Center.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Drug to be used is in accordance with the main International Consensus on Asthma Treatment and with the III - Brazilian Consensus on Asthma Management.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: During patient recruitment and screening, their parents or guardians will fill out the free informed consent form.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients included in group 1 will receive two types of telephone calls: A. Investigation telephone call - TI; B. Compliance telephone call - TA.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Signature of a informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of persistent moderate or severe asthma, according to III Brazilian Consensus on Asthma Management.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Co-morbidities that may interfere with the study evaluation or that require continuous drugs, e.g., cardiopathy, gastro-esophageal reflux or diabetes.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Continuous systemic corticosteroid use for more than seven days
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: The patient has been treated or is being treated with allergen-specific immunetherapy
